baseRule.text: 若復苾芻尼度有娠女人出家者。波逸底迦。
baseRule.label: Classical Chinese Mūlasarvāstivāda Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 111

fullParallels.text: Yā pana bhikkhunī gabbhiniṁ vuṭṭhāpeyya, pācittiyaṁ.
fullParallels.label: Paḷī Theravāda Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 61

translations.text: Welche Nonne aber eine Schwangere (in den Orden) aufnimmt, muß dafür sühnen.
Should any bhikkhuni give Acceptance to a pregnant woman, it is to be confessed.
Jika ada Bhikkhuni yang memberikan Penahbisan kepada seorang wanita hamil, itu harus di akui.

fullParallels.text: 「若比丘尼，知女人妊娠，度與受具足戒者，波逸提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Dharmaguptaka Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 119

fullParallels.text: 若比丘尼與懷妊女受具足戒。波逸提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mahīśāsaka Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 116
